## MultiObserver class

Represent a list of observers registered to multiple Observables object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MultiObserver<T> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./decentraland-ecs.multiobserver.dispose.md) |  | Release associated resources |
|  [Watch(observables, callback, mask, scope)](./decentraland-ecs.multiobserver.watch.md) | <code>static</code> | Raise a callback when one of the observable will notify |
